name: Design Workshop
description:
Overview

With this workshop script you will be able to facilitate co-design sessions with your team!

This workshop was designed for agile teams.

It features analogous inspiration research exercise and methods from the Design Sprint book.

Example is included.


Estimated duration: 1 hour and 20 minutes

Recommended team size: 7-10 people


Tips

  1. Make sure you get one or two deciders, these roles will help you accelerate your decision making
  2. Time-box each exercise
  3. Pick a feature per session otherwise it might be too overwhelming for the team if you try to do everything in a single session (trust me, I committed this mistake)
  4. Don't skip the scope, this is where you define design criteria and separate out what will be included for the MVP (Minimum Viable Product) and what could be tackled in the future
  5. Design based on what you define in the scope of the workshop
